scripts.clear: clear && php artisan clear-compiled && php artisan optimize && composer dump-autoload && composer dump-autoload -o && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan config:clear
scripts.serve: clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan serve
